verses.text: 於是約伯回答說：
「但願稱稱我的煩惱，把我的災害一起放在天平上。
現在這些都比海沙更重，所以我冒失發言。
因為全能者的箭射中我，我的靈喝盡了箭的毒液， 神的驚嚇排陣攻擊我。

words.note: The leading space is a traditional Chinese Bible convention for emphasis.

words.definition: to array, line up for battle

verses.text: 野驢有草料還會哀鳴嗎？牛有飼料還會窮叫嗎？
verses.heading: Complaints Reflect Suffering

verses.text: 淡而無鹽的食物有甚麼好吃呢？蛋白有甚麼味道呢？

words.note: Lit. 'bland and without salt'.

verses.text: 這些使我惡心的食物，我必不肯嘗。

words.note: Refers to feeling disgust or nausea; lit. 'evil heart' in some contexts.

verses.text: 神剪除但願我得著我所祈求的，願 神賜我所盼望的。

words.note: Used metaphorically for divine judgment or removal from life.
Expresses a strong wish or hope.
Indicates successful attainment of something.
Grammatical particle indicating the object of the verb that follows, often forming a noun phrase.
Grammatical particle indicating the object of the verb that follows, often forming a noun phrase.
Stronger than just 'hope', implies earnest expectation.

verses.heading: A Cry for Death

verses.text: 願他樂意把我壓碎，願他放手把我剪除。

words.note: Lit. 'release hand'; idiomatically means to let go.
Used metaphorically for divine judgment or removal from life.

verses.text: 這樣，我們得安慰，在痛苦之中我還可以歡躍，因為我沒有否認那聖者的言語。

words.note: A more literary or formal way to say 'in'.
A more formal or literary term for 'rejoice'.
Used to negate 'have' or past actions.
Often refers to God or Christ in biblical contexts.
A general term for spoken or written words.

verses.text: 我有甚麼力量使我能等候呢？我的結局是甚麼好叫我忍耐呢？
我的氣力是石頭一樣嗎？我的肉身是銅的嗎？

words.note: Commonly used in religious contexts for the physical body.

verses.text: 我裡面不是無能自助嗎？見識不是離我而去嗎？
朋友應該憐憫灰心的人，因為他捨棄了對全能者的敬畏。

words.note: Refers to the omnipotent God.

verses.heading: Disappointing Friends

verses.text: 我的兄弟詭詐像乾涸的溪流，又像流乾的溪水；
水流因冰塊融化而混濁，有雪隱藏在其中。
天氣一暖溪水就消失，氣候一熱就乾涸。

words.note: Used with 就 (jiù) to mean 'as soon as... then...'
Used with 一 (yī) to mean 'as soon as... then...'

verses.text: 商隊順溪而行，結果偏離原道，走到荒野之地而死亡。

words.note: Archaic equivalent of 的 (de), common in classical Chinese and biblical texts.

verses.text: 提瑪的商隊瞻望溪水，示巴的客旅等候水流。

words.note: Refers to someone traveling or residing temporarily in a foreign land.

verses.text: 他們失望，因為所盼望的落了空；他們到達那裡就灰心。

words.note: Nominalizer, forming a noun phrase from a verb or verb phrase.
Turns '所盼望' (that which was hoped for) into a noun phrase.
An idiom meaning hopes or efforts were in vain.
Lit. 'heart turns to ash'.

verses.text: 現在你們就是這樣，看見我的災難就害怕。
難道我說過『請供給我』，或說『取你們的財物餽贈我』嗎？

words.definition: is it possible that...?; rhetorical question
words.note: Used to introduce a rhetorical question, expecting a negative answer.

words.definition: to give as a gift, to present
words.note: More formal or literary than '送 (sòng)'.

verses.heading: Friends’ Fears

verses.text: 或我說過『救我脫離敵人的手』，或說『贖我脫離強暴人的手』嗎？

words.definition: to break away from, to get rid of

words.note: Carries significant theological meaning of redemption in Christian contexts.

words.definition: to break away from, to get rid of

verses.text: 請指教，我就默不作聲；請指示，我有甚麼過錯。

words.note: An idiom meaning 'to not make a sound, to keep silent'.

verses.heading: No Sin Discovered

verses.text: 正直的言語多麼有力！但你們的責備究竟責備甚麼呢？
絕望人的話不過是風，你們還想批判嗎？

words.note: Lit. 'cut off hope'
Indicates something is nothing more than X

verses.text: 你們竟抽籤得孤兒，拿朋友當貨物。

words.note: Common method for decision-making in ancient times

words.definition: to treat as, to regard as

verses.text: 現在請你們看看我，我絕不當你們的面撒謊。

words.note: Reduplication of verb '看' (kàn) softens the tone.

verses.heading: Other Explanation

verses.text: 請轉意，不要不公道；請再轉意，我還有道理在。
我的舌上有不義嗎？我的口不能辨別災害嗎？」
